page.title: 10My Spare Time (2)
page.content:
I live in Flint and it is very boring. It has quite a few shops, two markets and a leisure centre, but none of these are near where I live. There is a derelict castle and a park in Flint as well.
The leisure centre is open every day of the week until 10 pm, but you can only go swimming at the weekend until 5 pm. In the leisure centre you can do lots of things like badminton, squash, table tennis, swimming or you can go into the trimnasium. If you buy a "Fairplay" ticket for Â£1.50 you can do all these things free until 5 pm all week. My friends and I often go to the leisure centre, but apart from that Flint is very boring.
